Title: substring
Description: Returns the substring of a string s which starts at the specified byte index offset. Byte counting starts from 1. If offset is 0, an empty string is returned. If offset is negative, the substring starts pos characters from the end of the string, rather than from the beginning. An optional argument length specifies the maximum number of bytes the returned substring may have.

s — The string to calculate a substring from. String, FixedString or Enumoffset — The starting position of the substring in s . (U)Int*.length — The maximum length of the substring. (U)Int*. Optional.
A substring of s with length many bytes, starting at index offset. String.
